product_name: Fischer Sprint Crown Junior Skis with Bindings
long_description: Get your kids kicking and gliding along side you with the popular Fischer Sprint Crown junior skis. They offer a great combination of stability, easy maneuverability and durability. Air channels integrated into the wood core save weight over a pure wood core. All-purpose waxless climbing pattern on the bases provides long-lasting grip and consistent glide over the life of the skis. Sintec sintered graphite bases glide well in most conditions. Ultra tuning process creates an offset base structure that skis fast in nearly any snow. Fischer Sprint Crown junior skis come pre-mounted with XC junior NNN bindings.
short_description: Get your kids kicking and gliding along side you with the popular Fischer Sprint Crown junior skis. They offer a great combination of stability, easy maneuverability and durability.
